title: HUGE FPS Drop (120+ to 3-7) + 100% CPU usage in game
body:
Since a day or two ago ive been having really bad fps.  It started off as slight drops that were pretty noticeable to me (120 - 90/100) and ive been trying to fix it since.  I tried reinstalling/redownloading it but that didnt help.  I thought it could be a driver issue with a security update from windows from 2 days ago so I did a clean install of windows 10 but, that is what made it turn into this single fps situation.  I have already disabled the XBOX DVR, and the only thing i have installed since the clean install is chrome and league.  

Im guessing something happened to my CPU as now after the clean install it has caused league to take up 100% cpu.  Or something with the 7.1 patch is causing it.

I have a 1060 6GB and an i5 6100 and my gpu is up to date in drivers.

Thanks for any help in advance.

replies.body:
Since you're having issues with both your framerate and CPU usage, I suspect there may be some issues with your system drivers or windows power settings. I'd recommend updating all your drivers (not just display) and running all available windows updates before working through our [**FPS Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if this caused any change.
